channel.title: How do i make myself admin on a 508 server?
channel.description: I need major help coding a 508 server. Im using Meezy Scape Source. I just recently came from 317 servers and would really like some advice. Thank you.

item.title: How do i make myself admin on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @undercover12 undercover12
item.description:
@undercover12 wrote:

[quote=“java freak, post:2, topic:372732”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=468766.msg3427218#msg3427218 date=1292036804]
I need major help coding a 508 server. Im using Meezy Scape Source. I just recently came from 317 servers and would really like some advice. Thank you.
[/quote]

login.java (rs2>palidino76>io),

search

p.rights = 2;

and you should see a username change that username to yours.[/quote] just go to characters and u need to find character-rights = 0 u if u want admin do the 0 to 2 owner is 3 4 hidden mod 5 …

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin on a 508 server?

item.title: How do i make myself admin on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @java_freak java freak
item.description:
@java_freak wrote:

vManlyMan:

I need major help coding a 508 server. Im using Meezy Scape Source. I just recently came from 317 servers and would really like some advice. Thank you.

login.java (rs2>palidino76>io),

search

p.rights = 2;

and you should see a username change that username to yours.

Read full topic
